Description: Shoot an arrow that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_PoisonShot.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. On hit or land, this arrow creates <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> radius poison cloud that lasts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6s</font>. Foes entering the cloud are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">poisoned</font> and take <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This ability cannot headshot.)</font>

Poison Shot's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">poison</font> now does <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison_Upgrade.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Direct hits against targets are more powerful and now deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_PoisonShot_Upgrade.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.

Leap back <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font> and shoot an arrow dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.BowAttackJumpBack.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage to your target.

Evade Shot <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushes</font> the target back <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.BowAttackKnockBack.ImpactDistanceY]}m</font>.

Evade Shot grants you a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Bow_EvasiveShot_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Bow_EvasiveShot_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

Shoot a barrage of arrows that covers a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Bow_Spell_RainOfArrows.Radius]}m</font> radius area and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_RainOfArrows_Attack.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This ability cannot headshot.)</font>

Rain of Arrows causes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_RainofArrows_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_RainofArrows_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Rain of Arrows causes a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_RainOfArrows_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_RainOfArrows_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeDmg.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> more damage for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeDmg.BaseDuration]}s</font> after dodging.

If surrounded by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> or more foes within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> of you, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteWhenFoesNear.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

Hitting a foe below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health reduces all bow ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_CDRVsLow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.

If you hit a foe with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100%</font> health, inflict a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_SlowFull.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_SlowFull.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Hitting a foe with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_StaminaVsDebuff.Stamina]}</font> stamina.

After you dodge, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeHaste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DodgeHaste.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap.BaseDuration]}s</font> when you swap to your bow. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DmgVsDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to foes suffering from a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Debuff</font> durations last {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DebuffDur.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}% longer. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not affect crowd control debuffs.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Leg shots</font> cause <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Bow_Skirmish.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Bow_Skirmish.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Shoot <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> consecutive arrows.

First Arrow: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_RapidAttack_Standard.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
Second Arrow: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_RapidAttack_Standard.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.
Third Arrow: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_RapidAttack_KnockBack.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font>.

If all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> arrows hit the same target, Rapid Shot's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_RapidAccuracy_CDROnLast.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
The third arrow of Rapid Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_RapidAccuracy_DmgOnLast.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> extra damage.

Shoot an arrow that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_Penetrating_Attack.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">passes through</font> targets.\n\nThis attack has a range of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100m</font>.

Penetrating Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_Penetrating_AttackA1.HitRateDmgModifier * 100]}%</font> increased damage after each hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[DamageTable.Bow_Penetrating_AttackA1.MaxHitRateDmgMod * 100]}% damage.)</font>

Penetrating Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_PenetratingShot_DmgPerDist.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_PenetratingShot_DmgPerDist.DistFromDefender]}m</font> or more away.

Fire an arrow that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_ExplosionShot_Projectile.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage on hit, then <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">explodes</font> on impact dealing an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_ExplosionShot_Explosion.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> damage to all targets within a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Ability_Bow_ExplosiveShot_Explosion.Radius]}m</font> radius.

Explosive Arrow direct hits inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_ExplosiveShot_Burn.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage every second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_ExplosiveShot_Burn.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Explosion damage increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.Bow_ExplosionShot_Explosion_Dmg.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage, but decreases the explosion radius to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Ability_Bow_ExplosiveShot_Explosion_SizeChange.Radius]}m</font>.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsDist.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to foes at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsDist.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away.

Heavy attack arrows <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fly faster</font> and deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_HeavyDmg.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage.
Receive <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Hunter_ArmorAimHeavy.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> less damage while aiming.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsLow.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health.

Heavy attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to foes with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100%</font> health.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> extra damage to any foe as long as you have not damaged them in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst_Tracker.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Increases the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">distance</font> that arrows travel before being affected by gravity by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100%</font>.

When you land a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font>, heal yourself for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_HealOnFive.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of damage done.
Increases critical chance of bow shots by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_Crit.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.

When you land a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font>, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter.HeadshotDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage and have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter_Refund.RefundAmmoPercentChance * 100]}%</font> chance to get your arrow back.
